doc.title: 25 Ways to Quit Smoking
doc.plot: Noted animator Bill Plympton helps you kick the habit by illustrating 25 ways to curb your nicotine cravings that are effective, simple, and often far more hazardous to your health than a 5-pack-a-day habit. Beware the sumo treatment!

Noted animator Bill Plympton helps you kick the habit by illustrating 25 ways to curb your nicotine cravings that are effective, simple, and often far more hazardous to your health than a 5-pack-a-day habit. Beware the sumo treatment!
